response.original_title: The Beatles’ “Hey Jude” in DTS-HD MA
response.overview: Experience the timeless collection of The Beatles’ “Hey Jude” with the unparalleled clarity of DTS-HD Master Audio Surround on Blu-ray. Released in 1970, this compilation album features a selection of singles and B-sides that span the band’s illustrious career. Iconic tracks like “Hey Jude,” “Revolution,” and “Lady Madonna” are presented alongside gems such as “Paperback Writer” and “Don’t Let Me Down,” showcasing the band’s versatility and enduring appeal.  With DTS-HD MA Surround, every song is delivered with stunning precision, enveloping you in a rich, multi-dimensional audio experience. The high-definition audio format preserves the intricate arrangements and pioneering recording techniques, offering an immersive listening experience for audiophiles and Beatles fans alike.  A Compilation of Classics! Rediscover “Hey Jude” and immerse yourself in the album that captures the essence of The Beatles’ musical journey.
response.title: The Beatles’ “Hey Jude” in DTS-HD MA
